DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate potential test material produce photoallergic response .
DOC.criteria: Be male female age 18 60 inclusive Be lightly pigment ( Fitzpatrick Skin Type I , II , III ) Have read sign write Informed Consent Form complete Health Insurance Portability Accountability ( HIPAA ) Authorization Form conformance 45CFR Parts 160 164 Be general good health determine subject 's medical history discretion investigator Have visible sunburn Have history sun hypersensitivity/photosensitivity photosensitive dermatosis Have know hypersensitivity allergy active nonactive ingredient investigational product Subjects employee Contract Research Organization ( CRO ) and/or Bayer household member employee
